questions.content:
$a$ is directly proportional to $b$.

When $a = 7$, $b = 28$.

Find the value of $b$ when $a = 5$.

\vspace{8cm}

 \hfill $b = \underline{\hspace{4cm}}$

$x$ is directly proportional to $y$.

When $x = 4$, $y = 20$.

Find the value of $y$ when $x = 6$.

\vspace{8cm}

$x$ is directly proportional to $y$.

When $x = 5$, $y = 25$.

Find the value of $y$ when $x = 6$.

\vspace{8cm}

$x$ is directly proportional to $y$.

When $x = 4$, $y = 12$.

Find the value of $y$ when $x = 9$.

\vspace{8cm}

$p$ is inversely proportional to $q$.

When $p = 10$, $q = 2$.

Find the value of $q$ when $p = 5$.

\vspace{8cm}

$m$ is directly proportional to $n$.

When $m = 8$, $n = 24$.

Find the value of $n$ when $m = 6$.

\vspace{8cm}

$r$ is inversely proportional to $s$.

When $r = 15$, $s = 3$.

Find the value of $s$ when $r = 5$.

\vspace{8cm}
